title: Kevin Hart -- Sorry Adidas ... James Harden Will Return to Nike
text:
Kevin Hart -- Sorry Adidas ... James Harden Will Return to Nike 
Published By: TMZ.com - Today 
James Harden shouldn't trash his old Nikes just yet ... 'cause Kevin Hart predicts the NBA star will eventually COME BACK to the Swoosh ... ... Read Full Story ... Related articles:
